text: Atahpara yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche, tini taderake purna kare dibena tadera puraskara ebam nija anugrahe aro besi debena. Ara yara (allahara ibadata kara) heya jnana kareche ebam ahankara kareche, taderake tini kastadayaka sasti debena. Ara allaha chara tadera jan'ya tara kona abhibhabaka o sahaya pabe na
